resources.string: The main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. Mario is very positive and always. He is happy. You can recognize him by his blue overalls, his red cap and his characteristic mustache. Princess Peach considers him her trusted friend, and everyone does. She knows him and his brother Luigi for their acts of bravery. Mario excels in sports such as tennis, golf, baseball, soccer and even kart racing. It is good in all sports! He is a plumber by profession, but the truth is that he is a jack of all trades.
Mario uses his powerful jumping ability and a large amount of upgrades to face his archenemy, Bowser.

Mario\'s brother and hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. Luigi is recognized instantly by his green cap and shirt. Luigi is friendly, but a little nervous, especially if there are ghosts around. However, their abilities match Mario\'s abilities, so when these brothers come together, there is nothing they cannot achieve.
Luigi is taller and can jump higher than Mario. If you pay attention, You may also notice that the shape of his mustache is a little different as well.

The beloved princess of the Mushroom Kingdom. He is extremely kind and is always working to create a world in which everyone can live together happily. Her famous pink dress is charming. Princess Peach is always ready to participate in a wide variety of sports, and She also loves to bake and cook.
She and Mario are very good friends and are always willing to Help each other when you can.
Resident of the Mushroom Kingdom, he works in the service of Princess Peach. Toad has red spots on his head, although others of his species come in a variety of colors.
Toad is very happy and loyal. He does everything he can to help Mario and Luigi in their endeavors. to protect the Mushroom Kingdom from Bowser, even if it means facing danger during the process.

The king of the Koopas. Bowser is Mario\'s archenemy and always is wreaking havoc on the Mushroom Kingdom. Bowser has many henchmen who They include the Koopas, Goombas, Bill Bala and Shy Guys. Every time you look at the Mushroom Kingdom\'s plans are thwarted by Mario and his friends.
Este poderoso enemigo posee una gran fuerza y hasta puede escupir fuego.
Mario\'s trusty companion from Yoshi\'s Island. It is green, but others of its species come in other colors, such as red, blue, pink and yellow.
Yoshi is friendly and calm. It uses its long tongue to eat fruits and enemies, which it can turn into eggs that it can throw.
The king of the jungle is distinguished by a red tie with his initials.
Donkey Kong can throw gigantic barrels with the greatest of ease, and his strength is so great that the ground shakes every time he hits it.
Mario\'s self-proclaimed archenemy. Wario wears purple overalls, a yellow cap, and has a zigzag mustache that you\'ll instantly recognize.
He has a loud personality and doesn\'t worry about the little things. He loves garlic and money.
